attributes.action: Allow Arfur Mo to Stand for Mayor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once allowed to stand for mayor arfur mo will disclose his key policies, some being abolish congestion charge, allow free parking at all times, make clamping and ticketing of vehicles illegal and make sure that Ovaltine is not packaged in plastic containers. Afur Mo represents everyone from the joe bloggs to the Non Inspectorated Intruder Alarm Installers and we know can make a real difference to london.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
